submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        c = [0] * (k + 1)
        maxi = [0] * (k + 1)
        n = len(nums)
        h = n >> 1
        for i in range(h):
            x = abs(nums[i] - nums[n-1-i])
            c[x] += 1
            y = max(nums[i], k - nums[i], nums[n-1-i], k - nums[n-1-i])
            maxi[y] += 1
        res = inf
        t = 0
        for i in range(k + 1):
            res = min(res, h - c[i] + t)
            t += maxi[i]
        return res
